mumble.mburger.sdk.MBClient

Class MBurgerMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • mumble.mburger.sdk.MBClient.MBurgerMapper

  • public class MBurgerMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to map custom user objects from a Nooko section. Only works with Classes with values or Nooko objects, not with user innested objects

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • mapToCustomObject

        public static java.lang.Object mapToCustomObject(MBSection section,
                                                 MBFieldsMapping fieldsMap,
                                                 java.lang.Object destinationObject,
                                                 boolean getSimpleValues)
        Maps a section into a custom user object. You must provide a Map of "section keys" -> "object fields" in order to do a correct matching with the section data, make also sure that all the fields are the same type as the matching field. You should not make objects with objects inside (a part from the Nooko classes) with this method.
        Parameters:
        section - is the section you wish to map
        fieldsMap - is a map which contains the user object fields as keys and the section key as value, images, addresses and media has special fields to obtain the first element or just part of the object
        destinationObject - is an empty user object, which has at least getters and setters
        getSimpleValues - represents if for media and images you wish to have only the url of the media or the whole object
